text: The following lists the events of the 1931 Philadelphia Phillies season. == Offseason == * November 6, 1930: Tommy Thevenow and Claude Willoughby were traded by the Phillies to the Pittsburgh Pirates for Dick Bartell.Tommy Thevenow page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
